text: Same Time, Next Year is a 1978 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and was based on the 1975 play of the same name by Bernard Slade. It stars Alan Alda, Ellen Burstyn, Ivan Bonar and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1979. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:1978 romantic comedy movies Category:1978 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in California
title: Same Time, Next Year (movie)
